verbs.description: [ARG0: Just a couple of guys] [V: talking] [ARG1: cars] — while the world watches . President Donald Trump offered North Korea leader Kim Jong Un a rare glimpse inside the presidential limousine known as " The Beast " on Tuesday as their historic summit in Singapore wound down .
